nodes.text: Parsol d'Ahndole was a hero and adventurer who was active during the early days of the Galactic Republic. The deeds performed by d'Ahndole were considered by many to be decidedly heroic in nature and were dramatized in a series of holofeatures.

During the Galactic Civil War, an Alliance to Restore the Republic operative named Graf Yonna developed an alternate personality modeled after d'Ahndole's romanticized persona and also took his name. In particular, this personality exhibited by Yonna was melodramatic, had an extreme intolerance toward those he perceived to be evil—which led him to kill an Imperial general whom he was assigned to merely kidnap—and drove him to perform heroic feats, which saved thousands of Rebel lives.
